'''Lord Gregor Forrester''', the Lord of [[Ironrath]], is lord of a strong Northern House and a bannerman of [[House Glover]], who are in turn loyal to the great house of the north â€“ the [[House Stark|Starks]].
sections.Biography:
===Background===
As a youth, he famously arm-wrestled [[Galbart Glover]] for the privilege of becoming the man's squire; Glover later joked that he'd gladly lose the match all over again. After his father died at [[Battle of the Trident|the Trident]], Gregor ascended to the lordship, and married Elissa Branfield at the behest of [[Robert Baratheon]].

==="[[Iron From Ice]]"===
Lord Forrester is killed during the [[Red Wedding]].<ref>"[[Iron From Ice]]"</ref> After retreating from the battle with his squire Gared he drops to his knees proclaiming he is too injured to continue and orders his squire to return to Ironrath with the Greatsword of house Forrester and deliver the message that "The North Grove must never be lost" to his uncle Duncan before dying trying to fight off pursuing Frey soldiers allowing enough time for Gared to escape.

==="[[The Lost Lords]]"===
Lord Forrester's lifeless body is seen on a corpse cart along with several other bodies, including his son, Rodrik who has somehow managed to survive the slaughter of the [[House Frey|Freys]].

His corpse is later seen on an ironwood casket, along with his third-born son [[Ethan Forrester|Ethan]] who perished at the hands of [[Ramsay Snow]].

A funeral is held for Lord Forrester and his son Ethan. His first-born Rodrik reads a eulogy for his deceased father and brother and his second-born daughter [[Talia_Forrester|Talia]] performs a song she wrote in the days leading up to his wake.
